name: Bubbles In A Rectangle
description:
Controls

  • Left Stick to move
  • X (PS4), A (Logitech) to jump and double jump
  • O (PS4), B (Logitech) to pick up player and then again to throw them

Objective

  • Each player must reach the opposite end of the map within the remaining round time. When all players reach the correct end, time is added and the next round starts. Beware the traps that appear between the ends!

Traps

  • Geyser traps will flash red before going off, launching player's caught in it's radius
  • Crumbling traps will shake at the epicenter before all tiles attached in an X or + pattern will also fall.
  • Water traps will crash onto the map from the top or bottom. Ride the peak if you can, just be careful for when it passes, you may find yourself sleeping with the fishes
  • Frost traps appear cyan at certain points and then disappear from view. If you hit one you'll slow down and freeze. Call out to your friends for help, they can pick you up and throw you to negate the effect.

Tips

  • If you seem to be stuck against a tile, or in the floor, you friends can usually rescue you by picking you up. If the button doesn't seem to work, step away from the player, step back and try again.
